edu.washington.cs.ds.jeremyc.paxos
Class Ledger

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.ds.jeremyc.paxos.Ledger

@Entity
public class Ledger
extends java.lang.Object

Entries made in indelable ink. One record per decreeNum. The member names and descriptions are taken directly from Appendix A1 of Lamport's "Part-time Parliament".

Nested Class Summary
static class Ledger.LedgerAccessor
          Sleepycat JE Persistence implementation for accessing Ledger entries by decree number.
 
Field Summary
private  long decreeNum
          The number of the decree being maintained by this ledger entry.
private  BallotNumber lastTried
          The number of the last ballot that this member tried to begin, or null if there was none.
private  BallotNumber nextBal
          The number of the last ballot in which this member agreed to participate, or null if he has never agreed to participate in a ballot
private  Decree outcome
          The decree of this decree number or null if there is nothing written there yet.
private  BallotNumber prevBal
          The number of the last ballot in which this member voted, or null if he never voted.
private  Decree prevDec
          The decree for which this member last voted, or blank if never voted.
private  long timeLastTried
          This element is not specified in the paper, but we add it to keep a local timestamp of *when* we last tried to initiate a ballot for this decree number, so as we don't retry too often.

  Ledger(long decreeNum)

The number of the decree being maintained by this ledger entry.

private BallotNumber lastTried
The number of the last ballot that this member tried to begin, or null if there was none.

prevBal

private BallotNumber prevBal
The number of the last ballot in which this member voted, or null if he never voted.

prevDec

private Decree prevDec
The decree for which this member last voted, or blank if never voted.

nextBal

private BallotNumber nextBal
The number of the last ballot in which this member agreed to participate, or null if he has never agreed to participate in a ballot

timeLastTried

private long timeLastTried
This element is not specified in the paper, but we add it to keep a local timestamp of *when* we last tried to initiate a ballot for this decree number, so as we don't retry too often.
